title: Can't open the client
body: When I open League of Legends on my computer, the client won't load. I accidentally rejected the terms of service when it updated, and now it won't load to the login screen. What can I do to fix this?

replies.body: Try going into task manager and seeing if you can close all lol related programs. Then retry opening it.

^ Check this out as the program might not have fully closed so your pc thinks it's actually still open (so it won't open again). 

Also, make sure that you do the steps outlined in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) since your PC needs to have admin priveledges in order to access certain assets.
